Just download Vlc Media Player, (Link Below) And Run the Video file on the Software. It will start off In Japanese, All u have to do it Go to The Audio tab on the top left of the Widow and Place Mouse over Audio Track There will me 2 One is Jap, And the other English Just Click English And There u Go. it Should Sync with your Video File Instantly. You can even disable to subs to go to video (in the same region as the audio) and click disable so u have only English audio. U also dont even have to pirate "Vlc Media player" Its free on there web site
